history.proof: intros T P d l n H1 H2. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Prop) (d : T) (l : seq T) (n : nat), foldr (fun (d0 : T) (acc : Prop) => P d0 /\ acc) True l -> P d -> P (nth d l n)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : seq T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: s' => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ list_scope nat_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ list_scope]
Inductive True : Prop := I : True
domain_ind' : forall P : domain -> Prop, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (p : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial p e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (le : seq expr), P (Derivable n k f le)) -> (forall (m n k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (le : seq expr), P (Derivable2 m n k f le)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (m n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 m n e)) -> (forall f e1 e2 : expr, P (Integrable f e1 e2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f e1 e2 : expr), P (ParamIntegrable n f e1 e2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f e : expr), P (LocallyParamIntegrable n f e)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Set), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
expr_ind' : forall P : expr -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (le : seq expr), foldr (fun (e : expr) (acc : Prop) => P e /\ acc) True le -> P (AppExt k f le)) -> (forall (k : nat) (f : Rn k R) (n : nat) (le : seq expr), foldr (fun (e : expr) (acc : Prop) => P e /\ acc) True le -> P (AppExtD k f n le)) -> (forall e1 e2 : expr, P e1 -> P e2 -> P (App e1 e2)) -> (forall e1 e2 : expr, P e1 -> P e2 -> P (Subst e1 e2)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
last_ind : forall (T : Type) (P : seq T -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (s : seq T) (x : T), P s -> P (rcons s x)) -> forall s : seq T, P s
elimT : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), reflect P b -> b -> P
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
elimTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), reflect P b -> b = c -> if c then P else ~ P
iffP : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), reflect P b -> (P -> Q) -> (Q -> P) -> reflect Q b
introTFn : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), reflect P (~~ b) -> (if c then ~ P else P) -> b = c
SF_seq.nth_le_seq_step : forall (x0 : R) (l : seq R) (i : nat), (S i < size l)%nat -> Rabs (nth x0 l (S i) - nth x0 l i) <= SF_seq.seq_step l
SF_seq.sorted = fix sorted (T : Type) (Ord : T -> T -> Prop) (s : seq T) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | [::] => True | [:: h0] => True | h0 :: (h1 :: _) as t0 => Ord h0 h1 /\ sorted T Ord t0 end : forall T : Type, (T -> T -> Prop) -> seq T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope list_scope]
Inductive reflect (P : Prop) : bool -> Set := ReflectT : P -> reflect P true | ReflectF : ~ P -> reflect P false For reflect: Argument scopes are [type_scope bool_scope] For ReflectT: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For ReflectF: Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
all_iff = fun (P0 : Prop) (Ps : seq Prop) => let fix loop (P : Prop) (Qs : seq Prop) {struct Qs} : Prop := match Qs with | [::] => P -> P0 | Q :: Qs0 => all_iff_and (P -> Q) (loop Q Qs0) end in loop P0 Ps : Prop -> seq Prop -> Prop Argument scopes are [type_scope list_scope]
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} For sig: Argument A is implicit For exist: Argument A is implicit For sig: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For exist: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _]
AllIffConj : forall P Q : Prop, P -> Q -> all_iff_and P Q
ReflectT : forall P : Prop, P -> reflect P true
Inductive all_iff_and (P Q : Prop) : Prop := AllIffConj : P -> Q -> all_iff_and P Q For AllIffConj: Arguments P, Q are implicit For all_iff_and: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For AllIffConj: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _ _]
ReflectF : forall P : Prop, ~ P -> reflect P false
prop_in1 : forall T1 : Type, mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> Prop, phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
size_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (f : nat -> T) (n : nat), size (mkseq f n) = n
prop_in2 : forall T1 : Type, mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> T1 -> Prop, phantom Prop (forall x y : T1, P x y) -> Prop
foldl_rev : forall (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) (z : R) (s : seq T), foldl f z (rev s) = foldr (fun (x : T) (z0 : R) => f z0 x) z s
nth_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (f : nat -> T) (n i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) n -> nth x0 (mkseq f n) i = f i
nth_reshape : forall (T : Type) (sh : seq nat) (l : seq T) (n : nat), nth [::] (reshape sh l) n = take (nth 0%nat sh n) (drop (sumn (take n sh)) l)
set_nth_default : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (y0 x0 : T) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> nth x0 s n = nth y0 s n
take_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> take (S n) s = rcons (take n s) (nth x0 s n)
before_find : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (a : pred T) (s : seq T) (i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) (find a s) -> a (nth x0 s i) = false
nth_default : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (size s) n -> nth x0 s n = x0
nth_pairmap : forall (T1 : Type) (x1 : T1) (T2 : Type) (x2 : T2) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> forall x : T1, nth x2 (pairmap f x s) n = f (nth x1 (x :: s)%SEQ n) (nth x1 s n)
nthK : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x0 : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> {in ssrnat.gtn (size s), ssrfun.cancel (nth x0 s) (fun x : eqtype.Equality.sort T => index x s)}
mem_nth : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x0 : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> nth x0 s n \in s
nth_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), ssrfun.eqfun (nth x0 (set_nth x0 s n y)) (ssrfun.fun_of_simpl (ssrfun.SimplFunDelta (fun _ : eqtype.Equality.sort ssrnat.nat_eqType => eqtype.app_fdelta (eqtype.FunDelta (aT:=ssrnat.nat_eqType) n y) (nth x0 s))))
ncons = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) => ssrnat.iter n (cons x) : forall T : Type, nat -> T -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope _ list_scope]
nth_behead : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat), nth x0 (behead s) n = nth x0 s (S n)
nth_find : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (a : pred T) (s : seq T), has a s -> a (nth x0 s (find a s))
nth_zip : forall (S T : Type) (x : S) (y : T) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (i : nat), size s = size t -> nth (x, y) (zip s t) i = (nth x s i, nth y t i)
in_mem = fun (T : Type) (x : T) (mp : mem_pred T) => mp x : forall T : Type, T -> mem_pred T -> bool Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
foldr_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (h : T1 -> T2) (R : Type) (f : T2 -> R -> R) (z0 : R) (s : seq T1), foldr f z0 [seq h i | i <- s] = foldr (fun (x : T1) (z : R) => f (h x) z) z0 s

```coq
intros T P d l n H1 H2.
revert d. induction l as [| h t IH]; intros d H.
- destruct n; simpl in H2; assumption.
- destruct n; simpl in H2; apply IH with (d := h) in H2; assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros T P d l n H1 H2. revert d. induction l as [| h t IH]; intros d H. - destruct n; simpl in H2; auto. - destruct n; simpl in H2; apply IH with (d := h) in H2; auto.
